item.title: FTNT
item.description: score:366 Chances: Fortinet, Inc. is a leader in providing cybersecurity solutions to various businesses including enterprises, communication service providers, and small businesses. The company operates through multiple segments like Network Security, Infrastructure Security, Cloud Security, and Endpoint Protection, Internet of Things and Operational Technology, which demonstrates a diversified and comprehensive approach to cybersecurity solutions.
